alert.note: Alert for Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 29 at 5:14PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Flagler, southeastern St. Johns and eastern Putnam Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 513 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms in a bowing segment capable of producing a landspout along a line extending from near San Mateo to near Andalusia to near Crescent City. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, winds around 40 mph, excessive cloud-to-ground lightning, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Excessive cloud-to-ground lightning is occurring. Locations impacted include... Palm Coast, Saint Augustine, Palatka, Bunnell, Crescent City, Pomona Park, Hastings, East Palatka, Andalusia and Saint Augustine Beach. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns; Western Putnam
